title: The Thom Hartmann Show - June 29 2010 ( Raw Files )
description:
These are the unedited raw files of the show.  If someone wants to edit and re-upload the edits,  that would be great.

Free WMA (asf) to MP3 Converter (freeware) http://www.jodix.com/
mp3DirectCut (freeware) http://mpesch3.de1.cc/


Hour One: Kagan Hearings...why are the Republicans so attached to race bating politics?

Two: Who is Barack Obama really?  Thom talks to Newsweek's Jonathan Alter about his new book "The Promise: President Obama, Year One" <a href=" http://books.simonandschuster.com/Promise/Jonathan-Alter" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://books.simonandschuster.com/Promise/Jonathan-Alter</a>

Hour Three: Should we start to worry about Russian Redheads, invisible ink, shortwave radios, wifi cafes and nuclear weapons?  Russia Today's DC correspondent  Alyona Minkovski will be here
